item.title: Welcome to My New Digital Garden ðŸŒ±
item.description:
Hello, World! ðŸ‘‹

Welcome to my brand new blog. This site is special because it’s not just a websiteâ€”it’s a Digital Garden grown directly from my personal notes.

How This Works

I wrote this article comfortably inside Obsidian, my favorite note-taking tool. I didn’t have to touch any code or copy-paste text into a web browser.

  1. I write in Obsidian.
  2. I click a magic button on my Mac.
  3. It appears here on the internet.

Why “Digital Garden”?

“A garden is a collection of evolving ideas that aren’t strictly raw notes, but aren’t strictly polished articles either.”
